isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET (I-6 ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET (I-6 ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood assembly
Remove engine splash shield, RIGHT
Remove charge air cooler outlet hose from cooler and valve cover
Disconnect air compressor inlet hose from air cleaner tube, include p-clip
Disconnect injector wiring harness from valve cover
Disconnect manifold pressure sensor (MAP)
Remove wire harness support brackets from valve cover, include remove bracket from upper radiator hose
Secure upper radiator hose out of way for access
Secure harness out of way for access, include cut plastic tie from alternator wiring
Disconnect water heater hose p-clip from valve cover
Remove crankcase ventilation pipe
Remove valve cover bolts and studs
Remove valve cover, include disconnect under valve cover injector harness
Remove valve cover gasket
Clean mating surfaces and valve cover
Install valve cover gasket
Install valve cover, include connect under valve cover injector harness
Install valve cover bolts and studs, torque to spec.
Install crankcase ventilation pipe
Connect water heater hose p-clip to valve cover
Install wire harness support brackets to valve cover (4), include remove bracket from upper radiator hose
Connect manifold pressure sensor (MAP)
Connect injector wiring harness to valve cover
Connect air compressor inlet hose to air cleaner tube, include p-clip
Secure sensor wire harness and upper radiator hose as needed
Install Charge air cooler outlet hose to cooler and valve cover
Install engine splash shield
Close hood assembly and remove wheel chocks
